item.title: Matplotlib e Numpy
item.description: MatplotLib e Numpy ## Importando as bibliotecas import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt %matplotlib inline #Crando array com os salarios salarios = np.array([100,300,200,400]) salarios array([100, 300, 200, 400]) plt.plot(salarios) plt.show() plt.plot(salarios, c = 'Black', ls = '--') plt.show() plt.plot(salarios, c = 'Black', ls = '--', marker = 's' ) plt.show() # Adicionando Label salario_joao = np.array([100,300,200,400]) salario_rodrigo = np.array([300,250,100,600]) plt.plot(salario_joao, c = 'Black', ls = '--', marker = 's' , label = "Salario Jo√£o") plt.
